name: Core Breakout
description:
You are energy core of AI system in The Lab. Weird explosion set you free, but your physical form is very unstable. You have too explore lab in order to see daylight.

You are able to flip gravity with space bar.

Unfortunately I had no more time left to upload WebGL build :( 

A lot of things are not working and others are buggy. You can't finish level or restart it(bug that occured on the last build 5 minutes before deadline🥲)

Credits:
